name: skillbridge-microservices
description: SkillBridge Pro backend microservices with API Gateway

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:settings" "npm run start:project" "npm run start:chat"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd api-gateway && npm install && cd ../shared && npm install && cd ../services/user-service && npm install && cd ../settings-service && npm install && cd ../project-service && npm install && cd ../chat-service && npm install
scripts._comment_db_generate: Generate migration files from schema changes
scripts.db:generate: concurrently "npm run db:generate:user" "npm run db:generate:settings" "npm run db:generate:project" "npm run db:generate:chat"
scripts._comment_db_migrate: Apply migrations to database (resets tables, creates enums, then migrates)
scripts.db:migrate: npm run db:reset-all && npm run db:create-enums && concurrently "npm run db:migrate:user" "npm run db:migrate:settings" "npm run db:migrate:project" "npm run db:migrate:chat"
scripts._comment_db_drop: DROP all tables and enums (DESTRUCTIVE - no backup, deletes all data)
scripts._comment_db_reset: RESET database (drops tables WITH backup, then recreates enums for fresh migration)
scripts.db:reset:all-and-migrate: npm run db:reset:all && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:reset:all-and-setup: npm run db:reset:all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts._comment_clean: Cleanup scripts to remove node_modules and package-lock.json files
scripts._comment_update: Update all packages to latest versions
